definition: of ceramics, having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it
details:
adjective
- of ceramics, having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it
= example: of ceramics, having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it
= synonyms: glassy
- relating to or resembling or derived from or containing glass
= example: relating to or resembling or derived from or containing glass
- of, relating to, or constituting the vitreous humor of the eye
